title: Bug 116564: The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', but it changes with settings.
description: The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', but it changes with settings.
OB: When clicking on 'OK' and then reopening the hyperlink builder, the title of the hyperlink builder becomes 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should always be 'Hyperlink Options', regardless of the settings.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the hyperlink builder.
2. Click on 'OK'.
3. Reopen the hyperlink builder.

Expected result:
The title of the hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options'.
